meanings.sent1: The beach was rockless, perfect for playing in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The path through the meadow was rockless and easy to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome had a rockless garden to tend to, so he focused on the flowers instead.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a rockless field, clear and open to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The lake was so rockless that you could see your reflection perfectly in the water.

meanings.sent1: The rockless terrain made it easier for the hikers to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The rockless wall was smooth and easy to paint.
meanings.sent3: The rockless yard was a dream for the kids to run around in.
meanings.sent4: Her rockless backpack felt lighter on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The rockless field stretched out before them, inviting a game of tag.

meanings.sent1: The rockless garden was a blank canvas for the landscaper.
meanings.sent2: The rockless pond reflected the sky like a mirror.
meanings.sent3: The rockless hill was perfect for rolling down.
meanings.sent4: Her rockless hands reached out to touch the smooth surface.
meanings.sent5: The rockless desert seemed endless under the scorching sun.
